summary: Both requested fixes successfully verified: 1) API key (8767f2a0d2ca4adabdfb9e93d1361de6) persisted in backend/.env and football matches API working (67 matches returned). 2) Homepage default tab changed from 'Popular' to 'Top Matches' with correct active styling and content switching.
